episode.title: Board of Ed. of Paris Union School Dist. No. 95 v. Vail

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have the disposition to announce in No. 83-87, Board of Education against Vail and the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit is affirmed by an equally divided court, Justice Marshall, taking no part in the decision of the case.
